alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 4:38AM AKST until January 21 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches on top of 5 to 7 inches received overnight. Storm total snowfall from this event will be 7 to 11 inches. * WHERE...Yakutat and surrounding areas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy, wet snowfall will be difficult to manage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
